original: intros dsc coh_msg coh_soup. unfold soupCoh, cohMsg, post_msg. intros [? ds] [? ms] find_res. destruct (find_res) as [key_eq msg_eq]. split. + destruct (coh_soup dsc) as [valid_d valid_s s_valid]. split. * apply (l2 dsc). apply valid_s. * intros ? ? msg_find. specialize (valid_s _ _ msg_find) as msg_coh. destruct (msg_coh) as [tl_val msg_coh]. intros ? ? msg_eq'. destruct (tl_val m ms msg_eq') as [? [? msg_wf]]. intros ->. apply (msg_wf key_eq). + destruct (coh_msg ms) as [req_num req_eq | resp_num sdata_eq]. * exists req_num. rewrite req_eq in msg_eq. injection msg_eq. auto. * exists resp_num, sdata. rewrite sdata_eq in msg_eq. injection msg_eq. auto.
